description.original: Typewriter-style scrolling which keeps the view centered in the editor.
description.translation: 打字机风格的滚动，保持视图在编辑器中居中。推荐与zen插件搭配使用

dict..setDesc(\"Turns typewriter scrolling on: .setDesc("全局开启或关闭打字机滚动")
dict..setDesc(\"Positions the typewriter text: .setDesc("将打字机文本放置在屏幕的指定百分比位置")
dict..setDesc(\"Darkens non-active lines in t: .setDesc("在编辑器中加深非活动行的颜色，让您专注于正在输入的内容")
dict..setDesc(\"The opacity of unfocused line: .setDesc("禅模式下非聚焦行的透明度")
